verbs.description: Also , [ARG0: Trump] [V: assails] [ARG1: White House Correspondents ' Association] [ARGM-LOC: amid Michelle Wolf controversy] ; DOJ alters passages on media , racial gerrymandering in internal manual ; James Comey calls House GOP 's Russia probe ' a wreck '
